Posts.Content: I so excited i'm going to give pieces of my last week.. Had my pet scan tuesday. Good stuff first. Got a copy of my pet scan report. impression: 9mm lymph node is noted in the left axilla which demonstrates a mildly avid uptake of FDG with suv max 2.2 which suggests mild reactive adenitis. two small residual 5 m left supraclavicular lymph nodes demonstrating mild avid updake of FDG, SUV max 2.6. These also suggest residual reactive adenitis. OTHERWISE NEGATIVE PET SCAN. NO EVIDENCE OF DISTANT METASTASES,
Posts.Title: Breast cancer metastasis in Spine

Posts.Content: Well I'm back... here's breif overview 6/2011 Diag.with breast cancer. I had (L) breast Mastectomy and chemo. 6/26/2012 ct scan. Findings: A 2.5 cm soft tissue mass is present in the paraspinal posterior mediastinum to the left of T4vertebral body. This may represent a breast cancer metastasis, to the spine. MRI reveled just a simple cyst. 7/2012 Pet scan gave me a clean bill of health. Cancer free from eyes to thighs. 10/29/2012 2 days severe headaches no other symptoms. Cat Scan Findings: Brain Tumor my breast cancer metastases,to my brain. Sent me to las vegas, on 11/4/2012 I had brain surgery, they removed 98% of the tumor from my brain. I spent few days in ICU. Went back had post op appt. everything looks good, I feel great. Next step radiation. Where I live in Arizona, there is only 1 radiation oncologist Dr. First available consult appt is Dec 15. The same goes for other surronding cities. 1 dr.in area and very buzy no sooner appts available. Thats 6 weeks after my surgery, Supposed to start radiation 2 weeks after surgery. All i can do is wait.... Well Friday night I found a lump on the left side of my neck, you can actually see it sticking out. I'm sure since didnt radiate right away whatever might have been left in brain now is spreading thru my system. so Which Dr, do I call General Dr., Cancer DR.? Surgeon? Whats next or first????? Im not sure what im looking for or what my questions are. But Friday was the first time I realized well, Im sure you know,,, Thanks for listening. Debi
Posts.Title: Breast cancer metastasis in Spine

Posts.Content: 6/2011 Diag.with breast cancer. I had (L) breast Mastectomy and chemo. 6/26/2012 ct scan for COPD episode. Findings: lungs OK.. A 2.5 cm soft tissue mass is present in the paraspinal posterior mediastinum to the left of T4vertebral body. This may represent a breast cancer metastasis. I have No symptoms, no back pain, weakness, Etc..I have no symptoms related to spinal mass. I'm healthy except for breathing traoubles from copd. Looking for info on further tests and treatments? thanks debi [/FONT]
Posts.Title: Breast cancer metastasis in Spine

Posts.Content: I read as many posts as possible before posting my question. I was so impressed by your responses to eveyones questions. I was so hoping you would reply to mine. Thank you for replying to me. I just got back fro the cancer dr. He took some blood. Referred me for and MRI and a Pet scan. As for a biospy. My spinal mass is between my lungs and my spine. so a simply needle biospy can't be done. They referred me to a neurosurgeon on wednedsay to discuss him to doing a biospy. Sounds scary. Not sure what the difference is? At least thing seem to be moving fast. Again thank you for your kind words. Debi
